articles.author: Joshua Rhett Miller
articles.title: How to watch Nathan's Hot Dog Eating Contest - New York Post
articles.description: Coverage of the American tradition will start at 10:45 a.m. Monday on ESPN3 and ESPNews as thousands are expected to descend upon the corners of Surf and Stillwell avenues and relish the eaters scarfing down dogs for their chance at glory.
articles.content:
Competitive eating is back in Brooklyn for the Fourth of July — as champ Joey Chestnut seeks to finish off the field at Nathans Famous Hot Dog Eating Contest.
Chestnut, better known as Jaws, finishe… [+1833 chars]

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Americans divided over what US stands for on this July Fourth - CNN
articles.description: Rarely have Americans been so divided on what their country stands for as on the 246th anniversary of independence.

articles.author: PerthNow
articles.title: Robert Irwin ‘dating American actress Emmy Perry’ - PerthNow
articles.description: The two have been linked for a number of years, but the US actress recently visited the country, spending time at Australia Zoo with Irwin.
articles.content:
Robert Irwin may be off the market.
It seems he is dating long-time friend, actress Emmy Perry, according to reports in Womans Day.

articles.author: Christopher Carbone
articles.title: 10th anniversary of the Higgs Boson discovery: What have we learned from the 'God Particle'? - Daily Mail
articles.description: Many Americans will mark the country's birthday today, but science nerds will celebrate the tenth anniversary of the discovery of the Higgs Boson - also known as the 'God Particle' - on July 4th.
articles.content: Many Americans will mark the country's birthday today, but physicists and science nerds will also celebrate the tenth anniversary of the discovery of the Higgs Boson - also known as the 'God Particle… [+7097 chars]
